parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> High Command

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns parameters describing group in [[High Command|high command]] bar. Return value is array in format [groupName, teamName] or [] if error. Possible values for team name:
* <tt>"teammain"</tt> (default)
* <tt>"teamred"</tt>
* <tt>"teamgreen"</tt>
* <tt>"teamblue"</tt>
* <tt>"teamyellow"</tt>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''hcGroupParams''' group

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - commander

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> group: [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[hcGroupParams]] someGroup;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[High Command]],[[hcAllGroups]],[[hcLeader]], [[hcRemoveAllGroups]], [[hcRemoveGroup]], [[hcSelected]], [[hcSelectGroup]], [[hcSetGroup]], [[hcShowBar]], [[hcShownBar]], [[onHCGroupSelectionChanged]]
</value></part></template>
